title: What's Up With The Extreme Winter Weather?
teaser: Last year the Polar Vortex brought record breaking snow amounts and temperatures to Wisconsin and most of the Midwest. This year the East Coast seems to be suffering the brunt of it. The consistency of this pattern over all of North America is starting to concern scientists. Kathleen is joined by a research professor at Rutgers University's Institute of Marine and Coastal Sciences for a discussion on whatâ€™s going on .
